overview: How did the willful daughter of a Himalayan forest conservator become Monsantoâ€™s worst nightmare? The Seeds of Vandana Shiva tells the remarkable life story of Gandhian eco-activist Dr. Vandana Shiva, how she stood up to the corporate Goliaths of industrial agriculture, rose to prominence in the regenerative food movement, and inspired an international crusade for change.
title: The Seeds of Vandana Shiva
